#summary examples

== Examples ==

=== Select a data from a DB table ===

By a primary key value (If the "DATA" table has a primary key.)
{{{
Data data = dml.select(Data.class, "x");
}}}
By composite key values (If the "DATA" table has composite keys.)
{{{
Data data = dml.select(Data.class, "x", "y");
}}}
By List
{{{
List<Object> id = new ArrayList<Object>();
id.add("x");
id.add("y");
Data data = dml.select(Data.class, id);
}}}
By HttpServletRequest parameters
{{{
Data data = dml.select(Data.class, request);
}}}
By Map
{{{
Map<String, Object> paramMap = new HashMap<String, Object>();
paramMap.put("pk1", "x");
paramMap.put("pk2", "y");
Data data = dml.select(Data.class, paramMap);
}}}
By the object
{{{
Data data = new Data();
data.setPk1("x");
data.setPk2("y");
data = dml.select(data);
}}}
By another object
{{{
OtherData otherData = new OtherData();
otherData.setPk1("x");
otherData.setPk2("y");
Data data = dml.select(Data.class, otherData);
}}}
By candidate keys
{{{
Data data = new Data();
data.setCk1("l");
data.setCk2("m");
data = dml.selectByCondition(data);
}}}
